metadata.title: CVE-2023-52590 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ocfs2:Avoid touching renamed directory if parent does not change The VFS will notbe locking moved directory if its parent does not change. Change ocfs2rename code to avoid touching renamed directory if its parent does notchange as without locking that can corrupt the filesystem.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
